title: freebayes
description:
Freebayes is a Bayesian genetic variant detector designed to
find small polymorphisms, specifically SNPs.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

bam.description: Add FILE to the set of BAM files to be analyzed

bam_list.description: A file containing a list of BAM files to be analyzed

fasta_reference.description: Use FILE as the reference sequence for analysis

targets.description: Limit analysis to targets listed in the BED-format FILE

region.description: Limit analysis to the specified region, 0-base coordinates, end_position not included (same as BED format)

samples.description: Limit analysis to samples listed (one per line) in the FILE

populations.description: Each line of FILE should list a sample and a population which it is part of

cnv_map.description: Read a copy number map from the BED file FILE, which has either a sample-level ploidy or a region-specific format

gvcf.description: Write gVCF output, which indicates coverage in uncalled regions

gvcf_chunk.description: When writing gVCF output emit a record for every NUM bases

variant_input.description: Use variants reported in VCF file as input to the algorithm

only_use_input_alleles.description: Only provide variant calls and genotype likelihoods for sites and alleles which are provided in the VCF input, and provide output in the VCF for all input alleles, not just those which have support in the data

haplotype_basis_alleles.description: When specified, only variant alleles provided in this input VCF will be used for the construction of complex or haplotype alleles

report_all_haplotype_alleles.description: At sites where genotypes are made over haplotype alleles, provide information about all alleles in output, not only those which are called

report_monomorphic.description: Report even loci which appear to be monomorphic, and report all considered alleles, even those which are not in called genotypes

pvar.description: Report sites if the probability that there is a polymorphism at the site is greater than N

strict_vcf.description: Generate strict VCF format (FORMAT/GQ will be an int)

theta.description: The expected mutation rate or pairwise nucleotide diversity among the population under analysis

ploidy.description: Sets the default ploidy for the analysis to N

pooled_discrete.description: Assume that samples result from pooled sequencing

pooled_continuous.description: Output all alleles which pass input filters, regardles of genotyping outcome or model

use_reference_allele.description: This flag includes the reference allele in the analysis as if it is another sample from the same population

reference_quality.description: Assign mapping quality of MQ to the reference allele at each site and base quality of BQ

throw_away_complex_obs.description: Ignore complex events (composites of other classes)

use_best_n_alleles.description: Evaluate only the best N SNP alleles, ranked by sum of supporting quality scores

max_complex_gap.description: Allow haplotype calls with contiguous embedded matches of up to this length

min_repeat_size.description: When assembling observations across repeats, require the total repeat length at least this many bp

min_repeat_entropy.description: To detect interrupted repeats, build across sequence until it has entropy > N bits per bp

no_partial_observations.description: Exclude observations which do not fully span the dynamically-determined detection window

dont_left_align_indels.description: Turn off left-alignment of indels, which is enabled by default

use_duplicate_reads.description: Include duplicate-marked alignments in the analysis

min_mapping_quality.description: Exclude alignments from analysis if they have a mapping quality less than Q

min_base_quality.description: Exclude alleles from analysis if their supporting base quality is less than Q

min_supporting_allele_qsum.description: Consider any allele in which the sum of qualities of supporting observations is at least Q

min_supporting_mapping_qsum.description: Consider any allele in which and the sum of mapping qualities of supporting reads is at least

mismatch_base_quality_threshold.description: Count mismatches toward --read-mismatch-limit if the base quality of the mismatch is >= Q

read_max_mismatch_fraction.description: Exclude reads with more than N mismatches where each mismatch has base quality >= mismatch-base-quality-threshold

read_mismatch_limit.description: Exclude reads with more than N [0,1] fraction of mismatches where each mismatch has base quality >= mismatch-base-quality-threshold

read_snp_limit.description: Exclude reads with more than N base mismatches, ignoring gaps with quality >= mismatch-base-quality-threshold

read_indel_limit.description: Exclude reads with more than N separate gaps

standard_filters.description: Use stringent input base and mapping quality filters, equivalent to -m 30 -q 20 -R 0 -S 0

min_alternate_fraction.description: Require at least this fraction of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position

min_alternate_count.description: Require at least this count of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position

min_alternate_qsum.description: Require at least this sum of quality of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position

min_alternate_total.description: Require at least this count of observations supporting an alternate allele within the total population in order to use the allele in analysis

min_coverage.description: Require at least this coverage to process a site

max_coverage.description: Do not process sites with greater than this coverage

no_population_priors.description: Equivalent to --pooled-discrete --hwe-priors-off and removal of Ewens Sampling Formula component of priors

hwe_priors_off.description: Disable estimation of the probability of the combination arising under HWE given the allele frequency as estimated by observation frequency

binomial_obs_priors_off.description: Disable incorporation of prior expectations about observations

allele_balance_priors_off.description: Disable use of aggregate probability of observation balance between alleles as a component of the priors

observation_bias.description: Read length-dependent allele observation biases from FILE

base_quality_cap.description: Limit estimated observation quality by capping base quality at Q

prob_contamination.description: An estimate of contamination to use for all samples

legacy_gls.description: Use legacy (polybayes equivalent) genotype likelihood calculations

contamination_estimates.description: A file containing per-sample estimates of contamination, such as those generated by VerifyBamID

report_genotype_likelihood_max.description: Report genotypes using the maximum-likelihood estimate provided from genotype likelihoods

genotyping_max_iterations.description: Iterate no more than N times during genotyping step

genotyping_max_banddepth.description: Integrate no deeper than the Nth best genotype by likelihood when genotyping

posterior_integration_limits.description: Integrate all genotype combinations in our posterior space which include no more than N samples with their Mth best data likelihood

exclude_unobserved_genotypes.description: Skip sample genotypings for which the sample has no supporting reads

genotype_variant_threshold.description: Limit posterior integration to samples where the second-best genotype likelihood is no more than log(N) from the highest genotype likelihood for the sample

use_mapping_quality.description: Use mapping quality of alleles when calculating data likelihoods

harmonic_indel_quality.description: Use a weighted sum of base qualities around an indel, scaled by the distance from the indel

read_dependence_factor.description: Incorporate non-independence of reads by scaling successive observations by this factor during data likelihood calculations

genotype_qualities.description: Calculate the marginal probability of genotypes and report as GQ in each sample field in the VCF output

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
